WELCOME.WELCOME: Kanban board for teams to organize their work
WELCOME.DESCR: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks. Accomplish it all with RS Project Management App
WELCOME.HEADING: PROJECTmanagementSYSTEM
WELCOME.DESCR_P1: The task management system, or task manager, is a service that allows you to collect all work tasks in a single space. A simple and intuitive interface will allow you to create task lists, as well as drag and drop cards between columns, changing their status.
WELCOME.DESCR_P2: The task manager will help to:
WELCOME.DESCR_POINT_1: structure and make the company's work more transparent;
WELCOME.DESCR_POINT_2: plan the work on the project
WELCOME.DESCR_POINT_4: accelerate the onboarding of new employees.

PROFILE.SURE: Are you sure? This action is irreversible!
